column4: hi, now niether compiz or nautilus are starting up in my system... should they be in the .config/autostart dir? They are not there
AFAIK, windowmanager and filemanager are in GNOME's "required components" list, which means they will always be autostarted (and auto-restarted).
well, they're not starting up lol, what could be causing the problem?
What if you start one of them manually?
its not the ideal thing though
